dir.title: KidZone24
dir.summary: TVNZ Kidzone24 was a 24-hour ad-free New Zealand kids’ channel run by TVNZ, airing preschool shows from 2011 to 2016 on Sky and Freeview. Now available on TVNZ+ (OnDemand).

dir.title: TVNZ 2
dir.summary: TVNZ 2 is a New Zealand free-to-air channel focused on entertainment, targeting younger audiences with local and international shows.)
